english.segment1: You are the first. You go before. You are the last. Lord, You're the encore
english.segment2: Your name's in lights. For all to see. The starry Host. Declare Your glory
english.segment3: Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest
english.segment4: Apart from You. There is no God. Light of the world. The Bright and Morning Star
english.segment5: Your name will shine. For all to see. You are the One. You are my glory
english.segment6: Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest
english.segment7: And no one else could ever compare. To You, Lord. All the earth together declares
english.segment8: Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. To You, Lord. To You, Lord
english.segment9: Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. Glory in the highest. To You, Lord. To You, Lord
english.segment10: All the earth will sing Your praise. The moon and stars, the sun and rain. Every nation will proclaim. That You are God, and You will reign
english.segment11: So Glory, glory, hallelujah. Glory, Glory, to You, Lord. Glory, glory, hallelujah. Hallelujah
